sen.j: 井上 正経（いのうえ まさつね）は、江戸時代の大名、老中。
sen.e: Masatsune INOUE was a daimyo (Japanese feudal lord) as well as roju (member of shogun's council of elders) in the Edo period.
Masatsune INOUE was a daimyo (Japanese feudal lord) and roju (senior councilor) in the Edo period.
sen.cmt: as well as を and に修正しました。member of shogun's council of elders を senior councilor に修正しました。
sen.e: Masatsune INOUE was a daimyo (Japanese feudal lord) and roju (senior councilor) in the Edo period.

sen.j: 常陸国笠間藩第3代藩主、陸奥国磐城平藩主、遠江国浜松藩初代藩主。
sen.e: He was the third lord of Kasama Domain, Hitachi Province, the lord of Iwakitaira Domain, Mutsu Province, and the first lord of Hamamatsu Domain, Totomi Province.
He was the third lord of Kasama Domain, Hitachi Province, the lord of Iwakitaira Domain, Mutsu Province, and the first lord of Hamamatsu Domain, Totomi Province.
He was the third lord of Kasama Domain, Hitachi Province, the lord of Iwakitaira Domain, Mutsu Province, and the first lord of Hamamatsu Domain, Totomi Province.
He was the sixth of Inoue family of Hamamatsu Domain.
He was the sixth of Inoue family of Hamamatsu Domain.
He was the sixth of Inoue family of Hamamatsu Domain.

sen.j: 笠間藩2代藩主・井上正之の長男。
sen.e: He was the eldest son of Masayuki INOUE who had been the second lord of Kasama Domain.
He was the eldest son of Masayuki INOUE who had been the second lord of Kasama Domain.
sen.cmt: eldest を oldest に修正しました。
sen.e: He was the eldest son of Masayuki INOUE who had been the second lord of Kasama Domain.

sen.j: 元文2年（1737年）に家督を相続し、京都所司代、大坂城代、寺社奉行などを歴任し、宝暦10年（1760年）に老中に就任した。
sen.e: In 1737 he took over as the head of the family, then held the positions of Kyoto Shoshidai, Osaka jodai (the keeper of Osaka Castle), and jisha-bugyo (magistrate of temples and shrines) successively, and then assumed the post as roju in 1760.
sen.cmt: 「京都所司代以下の歴任」は1737年～1760年の事象ですので、「then」の語を2箇所に補いました。また、本文より「寺社奉行、大坂城代、京都所司代」の順序が正しいようですが、原文通りに訳しました。
sen.e: In 1737 he took over the position of the head of the family, then held the positions of Kyoto Shoshidai, Osaka jodai (the keeper of Osaka Castle), and jisha-bugyo (magistrate of temples and shrines) successively, and then assumed the post as roju in 1760.
sen.cmt: as を the position of に修正しました。(member of shogun's council of elders) 既出のため削除しました。
sen.e: In 1737 he took over the position of the head of the family, then held the positions of Kyoto Shoshidai, Osaka jodai (the keeper of Osaka Castle), and jisha-bugyo (magistrate of temples and shrines) successively, and then assumed the post as roju in 1760.

sen.j: 明和3年（1766年）没し、次男・正定が後を継いだ。
sen.e: He died in 1766 and Masasada, his second son, succeeded him.
He died in 1766 and Masasada, his second son, succeeded him.
He died in 1766 and Masasada, his second son, succeeded him.
Career
Career
Career
1725: The year of birth
1725: Masanori was born.
sen.cmt: The year of birth を Masanori was born. に修正しました。
sen.e: 1725: Masanori was born.

sen.j: 1737年（元文2年） ：将軍家初見、家督相続
sen.e: 1737: The first appearance to the Shogun family, succession to the headship of the house
1737: The first appearance to the Shogun family, succession to the position of family head.
sen.cmt: the headship of the house をthe position of family head に修正しました。
sen.e: 1737: The first appearance to the Shogun family, succession to the position of family head.
1747: Transferred to Iwakitaira Domain
1747: He was transferred to the Iwakitaira Domain.
sen.cmt: 文頭に He was、文末にピリオドを追記しました。Iwakitaira Domain に the を追記しました。
sen.e: 1747: He was transferred to the Iwakitaira Domain.
1752: Appointed to Sojaban (official in charge of the ceremonies)
1752: He was appointed to Sojaban (official in charge of the ceremonies).
sen.cmt: 文頭に He was、文末にピリオドを追記しました。
sen.e: 1752: He was appointed to Sojaban (official in charge of the ceremonies).

sen.j: 1753年（宝暦3年） ：寺社奉行（3月28日 (旧暦)）
sen.e: May 1, 1753: Appointed to Jisha-bugyo (magistrate of temples and shrines)
May 1, 1753: He was appointed to Jisha-bugyo.
sen.cmt: 文頭に He was、文末にピリオドを追記しました。 (magistrate of temples and shrines) 既出のため削除しました。
sen.e: May 1, 1753: He was appointed to Jisha-bugyo.

sen.j: 1756年（宝暦6年） ：大坂城代（5月7日 (旧暦)）
sen.e: June 4, 1756:Appointed to Osaka jodai (keeper of Osaka Castle)
June 4, 1756: He was appointed to Osaka jodai.
sen.cmt: 文頭に He was、文末にピリオドを追記しました。 (keeper of Osaka Castle) 既出のため削除しました。
sen.e: June 4, 1756: He was appointed to Osaka jodai.

sen.j: 1758年（宝暦8年） ：京都所司代、浜松に国替
sen.e: 1758: Appointed to Kyoto shoshidai (Kyoto deputy), transferred to Hamamatsu
1758: He was appointed to Kyoto shoshidai (Kyoto deputy), transferred to Hamamatsu.
sen.cmt: 文頭に He was、文末にピリオドを追記しました。
sen.e: 1758: He was appointed to Kyoto shoshidai (Kyoto deputy), transferred to Hamamatsu.
January 8, 1761: Appointed to Roju
January 8, 1761: He was appointed to roju.
sen.cmt: 文頭に He was、文末にピリオドを追記しました。
sen.e: January 8, 1761: He was appointed to roju.

sen.j: 1763年（宝暦13年）：老中辞任（3月13日 (旧暦)）
sen.e: April 25, 1763: Resigned from Roju
April 25, 1763: He was resigned from roju.
sen.cmt: 文頭に He was、文末にピリオドを追記しました。
sen.e: April 25, 1763: He was resigned from roju.
1766: Died at age of 42
1766: He died at age of 42.
sen.cmt: 文頭に He、文末にピリオドを追記しました。
sen.e: 1766: He died at age of 42.
